solution_line_template: The total number of pages is {book_one_pages} + {book_two_pages} = <<{book_one_pages}+{book_two_pages}={total_pages}>>{total_pages} pages
The number of pages Yasna needs to read every day for two weeks is {total_pages} / {total_reading_days} = <<{total_pages}/{total_reading_days}={pages_per_day}>>{pages_per_day} pages
